1.label: Lifeline
1.description: This group is normally automatically assigned to the Z-Wave system controller when EZMultiPli is added to the ZWave network.

2.label: Basic
2.description: This group is used to directly turn lights on or off when motion is detected.

paramInformation.label: Off Delay After Motion, 0=only sends motion triggers
Light Level Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Sets the interval for light level reports; 0 to disable

paramInformation.label: Temperature Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Sets the interval for temp level reports; 0 to disable

metadata.inclusion:
1) Place the device within the direct range of your Z-Wave controller.
2) Set the main controller in add mode (see the controller’s manual).
3) Click the button on the side of the unit once, the LED indicator should start blinking blue. 
4) Wait for the adding process to end.
5) Successful adding will be confirmed by the Z-Wave controller’s message.
metadata.exclusion:
1) Place the device within the direct range of your Z-Wave controller.
2) Set the main controller remove mode (see the controller’s manual).
3) Click the button on the side of the unit once
4) Wait for the removing process to end.
5) Successful adding will be confirmed by the Z-Wave controller’s message.
metadata.reset:
1) Power on the device
2) Press and hold the side button for 60 seconds.
2) Use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
